subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Striker Carlos Tévez said he was ready to return and play for Manchester City. But in an interview with Fox Sports, he said he was ordered around “like a dog” by Manager Roberto Mancini.
snippet: Striker Carlos Tévez said he was ready to return and play for Manchester City. But in an interview with Fox Sports, he said he was ordered around “like a dog” by Manager Roberto Mancini.
